RTCPeerConnectionGetSenders.summary:
The getSenders() method of the interface returns an array of objects, each of which represents the RTP sender responsible for transmitting one track's data.
A sender object provides methods and properties for examining and controlling the encoding and transmission of the track's data.
RTCPeerConnectionGetSenders.returns:
An array of objects, one for each track on the connection.
The array is empty if there are no RTP senders on the connection.The order of the returned RTCRtpSender instances is not defined by the specification, and may change from one call to getSenders() to the next.The array does not include senders associated with transceivers that have been stopped (following offer/answer).
